titles.title: When I Come To The End Of Myself

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I come to the end of myself
O Lord, You're there!
When I come to the end of my strength
O Lord, You're there!
When I come to the end of all that I am
And fall on my face before Thee,
I will always know that you will meet me there.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I come to the end of myself
O Lord, You're there!
When I come to the end of my strength
O Lord, You care!
When I come to the end of all that I am
And lay down my life before Thee,
I will always know that you will change me there.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cuando llego al fin de mí
Señor, tu estás
Cuando llego al fin de mis fuerzas
Señor, tu estás
Cuando llego al fin de lo que yo soy
Me arrodillo delante de ti
Siempre sabré que tú estarás ahí.
